svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - November 11 2023

title: "Week in Ethereum News
November 11, 2023" date: "2023-11-11"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
‚Ä¢ Latest all core devs ‚Äì execution (ACDE) call video . Recap by Tim Beiko .¬† Notes from Tim Beiko and
Christine Kim : Goerli shadowfork 0 upgraded to Dencun ( testing analysis ) Blob gas price in RPC:
adding single blobGasPrice method & adding to feeHistory EIP7545 (Verkle proof verification
precompile) presented
‚Ä¢ Goerli shadowfork 0 upgraded to Dencun ( testing analysis )
Goerli shadowfork 0 upgraded to Dencun ( testing analysis )
‚Ä¢ Blob gas price in RPC: adding single blobGasPrice method & adding to feeHistory
Blob gas price in RPC: adding single blobGasPrice method & adding to feeHistory
‚Ä¢ EIP7545 (Verkle proof verification precompile) presented
EIP7545 (Verkle proof verification precompile) presented
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
‚Ä¢ üö® Lido at 31.48% is increasing towards 33.3% threshold
üö® Lido at 31.48% is increasing towards 33.3% threshold
‚Ä¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~85% supermajority, could
possibly cause a chain split Consensus layer: Prysm 43% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3%
could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
‚Ä¢ Execution layer: Geth ~85% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth ~85% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
‚Ä¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 43% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm 43% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
‚Ä¢ Geographic diversity needed for stakers & nodes , particularly outside of US/Canada/EU
Geographic diversity needed for stakers & nodes , particularly outside of US/Canada/EU
Layer 1
‚Ä¢ Otterscan v2.2-ALPHA : improved Sourcify integration and UI improvements
Otterscan v2.2-ALPHA : improved Sourcify integration and UI improvements
‚Ä¢ Reth snapshots : public snapshots by merkle, sync a node in 6 hours
Reth snapshots : public snapshots by merkle, sync a node in 6 hours
For Stakers
‚Ä¢ Stereum v2 (node launcher): install/manage node via UI
Client releases
‚Ä¢ Consensus layer: Lodestar v1.12.0 : various updates, upgrade validator & beacon node clients
together Nimbus v23.10.1 : hotfix for peer scoring issue in v23.10.0
Consensus layer:
‚Ä¢ Lodestar v1.12.0 : various updates, upgrade validator & beacon node clients together
Lodestar v1.12.0 : various updates, upgrade validator & beacon node clients together
‚Ä¢ Nimbus v23.10.1 : hotfix for peer scoring issue in v23.10.0
Nimbus v23.10.1 : hotfix for peer scoring issue in v23.10.0
‚Ä¢ Execution layer: Nethermind v1.22.0 : improved memory management (consumption reduced ~25%)
Execution layer:
‚Ä¢ Nethermind v1.22.0 : improved memory management (consumption reduced ~25%)
Research
‚Ä¢ Validator smoothing commitments : out of protocol solution to improve permissionless liquid staking
protocols, node operators pay upfront to run validators for a minimum duration
Validator smoothing commitments : out of protocol solution to improve permissionless liquid staking
‚Ä¢ Inclusion list framework to evaluate designs on censorship resistance metrics
Inclusion list framework to evaluate designs on censorship resistance metrics
‚Ä¢ MEV burn benefits : improves validator economics, lessens builder liquidity requirements, increases
cost of censorship and improves resilience in a mass MEV event
MEV burn benefits : improves validator economics, lessens builder liquidity requirements, increases
‚Ä¢ Signature Merge : massive-scale signature aggregation using recursive SNARKs & PCD
Signature Merge : massive-scale signature aggregation using recursive SNARKs & PCD
Layer 2
‚Ä¢ OP Reth : Reth (execution layer client) can be used in OP Stack
OP Reth : Reth (execution layer client) can be used in OP Stack
‚Ä¢ Justin Drake: based rollup/validium preconfirmations of transaction execution, latencies on the
order of 100ms
Justin Drake: based rollup/validium preconfirmations of transaction execution, latencies on the order
of 100ms
EIPs/Standards
‚Ä¢ EIPs EIP7553 : Separated payer transaction
EIPs
‚Ä¢ EIP7553 : Separated payer transaction
‚Ä¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7554 : NFTs benefits attachment via metadata (ERC721 extension) ERC7555
: Single sign-on for account discovery ERC7556 : Embedded accounts as smart modules
ERCs (application layer):
‚Ä¢ ERC7554 : NFTs benefits attachment via metadata (ERC721 extension)
ERC7554 : NFTs benefits attachment via metadata (ERC721 extension)
‚Ä¢ ERC7555 : Single sign-on for account discovery
ERC7555 : Single sign-on for account discovery
‚Ä¢ ERC7556 : Embedded accounts as smart modules
ERC7556 : Embedded accounts as smart modules
Stuff for developers
‚Ä¢ Solidity v0.8.23 : fixes invalid verbatim deduplication bug
Solidity v0.8.23 : fixes invalid verbatim deduplication bug
‚Ä¢ Remix v0.37.0 : adds Semaphore Circom template, auto-complete loads ERC files and translations in
Spanish/French/Italian/Simplified Chinese
Remix v0.37.0 : adds Semaphore Circom template, auto-complete loads ERC files and translations in
‚Ä¢ Secureum RACE #23: 8 question Solidity quiz & answers
Secureum RACE #23: 8 question Solidity quiz & answers
‚Ä¢ Fe (language) bug bounty: Simple DAO
Fe (language) bug bounty: Simple DAO
‚Ä¢ Proposal for Edge (EVM domain specific language), currently at specification stage
Proposal for Edge (EVM domain specific language), currently at specification stage
‚Ä¢ Superchain faucet : claim 0.05 testnet ETH for OP Stack testnets
Superchain faucet : claim 0.05 testnet ETH for OP Stack testnets
‚Ä¢ 500 testnet ETH (Sepolia & Hole≈°ky) claimable by Devconnect attendees using Zupass
500 testnet ETH (Sepolia & Hole≈°ky) claimable by Devconnect attendees using Zupass
‚Ä¢ Zupass Scaffold-ETH 2 starter kit
Zupass Scaffold-ETH 2 starter kit
‚Ä¢ pcaversaccio‚Äôs Hardhat template : updated to ethers v6 & Hardhat configuration variables
pcaversaccio‚Äôs Hardhat template : updated to ethers v6 & Hardhat configuration variables
‚Ä¢ VSCode Solidity inspector : adds support for .tree files
VSCode Solidity inspector : adds support for .tree files
‚Ä¢ EVM tracing reference
EVM tracing reference
‚Ä¢ TypeChain deprecated
TypeChain deprecated
Security
‚Ä¢ AAVE security incident , forks of v2/v3 should disable stable rate mode borrowing
AAVE security incident , forks of v2/v3 should disable stable rate mode borrowing
‚Ä¢ MEV bot $2 million exploit via unprotected swap function
MEV bot $2 million exploit via unprotected swap function
‚Ä¢ Raft 1.6k ETH exploit , 1570 ETH burnt, attacker lost 4 ETH
Raft 1.6k ETH exploit , 1570 ETH burnt, attacker lost 4 ETH
‚Ä¢ The Standard on Arbitrum $260k exploit via price manipulation
The Standard on Arbitrum $260k exploit via price manipulation
‚Ä¢ zkSync Era vulnerability disclosed , 50k USDC bounty paid
zkSync Era vulnerability disclosed , 50k USDC bounty paid
Ecosystem
‚Ä¢ Devconnect live stream for selected events
Devconnect live stream for selected events
‚Ä¢ ETH Lisbon hackathon projects
ETH Lisbon hackathon projects
Onchain stats
‚Ä¢ Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 9.9 to 323.6 gwei, with 28.9 gwei average Zero net issuance
currently at 21.7 gwei 6.6k ETH net burn this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 9.9 to 323.6 gwei, with 28.9 gwei average
‚Ä¢ Zero net issuance currently at 21.7 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 21.7 gwei
‚Ä¢ 6.6k ETH net burn this week
6.6k ETH net burn this week
‚Ä¢ ETHUSD : $1,829 - $2,133, currently $2,080
ETHUSD : $1,829 - $2,133, currently $2,080
‚Ä¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.056 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.056 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
‚Ä¢ USDC & EURC v2.2 : phased rollout, reduces gas costs & supports ERC1271
USDC & EURC v2.2 : phased rollout, reduces gas costs & supports ERC1271
‚Ä¢ Coinbase Verifications : onchain user attestations for account & country verified by Coinbase, uses
Ethereum Attestation Service (EAS)
Coinbase Verifications : onchain user attestations for account & country verified by Coinbase, uses
‚Ä¢ Sablier UI dynamic streams : adds timelock, unlock-linear & unlock-cliff
Sablier UI dynamic streams : adds timelock, unlock-linear & unlock-cliff
‚Ä¢ CoW Swap programmatic orders : approve orders with a single signature, execute automatically
CoW Swap programmatic orders : approve orders with a single signature, execute automatically
‚Ä¢ Notional v3 live on Arbitrum, adds variable rate lending/borrowing & leveraged liquidity strategies
Notional v3 live on Arbitrum, adds variable rate lending/borrowing & leveraged liquidity strategies
‚Ä¢ Show Up (RSVP for events): request deposits on registration, attendees get paid for showing up
Show Up (RSVP for events): request deposits on registration, attendees get paid for showing up
‚Ä¢ Bountycaster (bounties platform) live on Farcaster, beta
Bountycaster (bounties platform) live on Farcaster, beta
‚Ä¢ Gaslite Drop adds airdrop to X (Twitter) post replies, filter & token gate recipients
Gaslite Drop adds airdrop to X (Twitter) post replies, filter & token gate recipients
‚Ä¢ Sound magic upload : zero gas upload, only requires an email address
Sound magic upload : zero gas upload, only requires an email address
‚Ä¢ Optimism We ‚ù§Ô∏è The Art : NFT creator contest (AI, generative, music & 1of1s), 1M OP in prizes
Optimism We ‚ù§Ô∏è The Art : NFT creator contest (AI, generative, music & 1of1s), 1M OP in prizes
Job Listings
‚Ä¢ Aragon: Senior smart contract developer w EIP, auditing experience
Aragon: Senior smart contract developer w EIP, auditing experience

Gnosis seek DevRels & Backend Devs

Regulation/business/tokens
‚Ä¢ UK FCA & Bank of England proposals for regulating stablecoins
UK FCA & Bank of England proposals for regulating stablecoins
‚Ä¢ OFAC sanctioned Ekaterina Zhdanova for laundering & moving funds on behalf of Russian elites
OFAC sanctioned Ekaterina Zhdanova for laundering & moving funds on behalf of Russian elites
‚Ä¢ SEC facing challenges hiring crypto specialists due to prohibition of holding
SEC facing challenges hiring crypto specialists due to prohibition of holding

Open problems in DAOs for researchers
‚Ä¢ DAO decentralization : Voting-Bloc Entropy (VBE) decentralization metric & a practical Dark DAO

General
‚Ä¢ Exchange hacks: $126M for Poloniex
Exchange hacks: $126M for Poloniex

ApeFest attendees report eye/skin issues , likely caused by UV lights
